name: NSTokenField
desc: A text field that converts text into visually distinct tokens.

items.name: var tokenStyle: NSTokenField.TokenStyle
items.desc: The token style of the receiver.

items.name: var tokenizingCharacterSet: CharacterSet!
items.desc: The recevier’s tokenizing character set to characterSet.

items.name: class var defaultTokenizingCharacterSet: CharacterSet
items.desc: Returns the default tokenizing character set.

items.name: enum NSTokenField.TokenStyle
items.desc: The NSTokenStyle constants define how tokens are displayed and editable in the NSTokenFieldCell. These values are used by tokenStyle and the delegate method tokenFieldCell(_:styleForRepresentedObject:).
